animeDescription: A returning veteran and karateka from WW2 starts working for the yakuza, looking for a man strong enough to kill him. After becoming karate champion, he joins an Italian woman who is looking for revenge against the nazis who killed her family.
animeStaff: [['Kajiwara Ikki', ['Original Creator']], ['Uchida Yoshiyuki', ['Art Director']], ['Nakajou Kentarou', ['Original Character Design']]]
